array.string: New units can be built on your base or factories
Units can be upgraded on your base or factories
To build unit tap your base or factory and press button with tank icon
To upgrade robot your need to move him on your base or factory and press button with spanner
Base or factory can build only one robot per turn
Your need to solve puzzle to be able to move throught gorges, barricades, swamps and minefields
Gorge will kill your robot if your don't solve the puzzle
If you don't solve a puzzle on a swamp your robot will become weaker
If you don't solve a puzzle on a minefield your robot will recieve some damage
If your capture weaponary all your robots will become stronger
If you capture a sheild all your robots will live longer
You can move only one robot per turn, but if you capture antenna, you will be able to move once more
If you capture a repairer, all yor robots will be repaired each turn
Bases are guarded by very powerful robot
Complete missions to unlock new units and upgrades
